entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning near noon. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming south 20 km/h this afternoon. High minus 5. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of snow. High minus 16.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 28 in the morning and minus 21 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Sunday 22 January 2023
